rooms.name: Train Station
rooms.description: Hagrid leaves you all alone in a busy train station. You watch as the Weaslys run into the brick wall to the east.

rooms.name: Platform 9 3/4
rooms.description: You see the Hogwarts Express train and watch people board the train with their owls and luggage.

rooms.name: Great Hall
rooms.description: You are in the Great Hall just after supper. Feel free to explore Hogwarts for the next few hours.

rooms.name: Great Hall
rooms.description: You are still in the Great Hall. To the east, you see a door to the kitchen. It is unlocked.

rooms.name: Great Hall
rooms.description: Still in the Great Hall, you walk by Ron and Hermionie.

rooms.name: Great Hall
rooms.description: You are still in the Great Hall. To the south, you see a small sitting area.

rooms.name: Sitting Area
rooms.description: You are in a small sitting area, surrounded by plush chairs and couches.

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description: You are in a cramped hallway.

rooms.name: Storage
rooms.description: You are in a small storage room, filled with magical items.

rooms.name: Potions Classroom
rooms.description: You walk into the magical potions classroom. To your disbelief, there are potions everywhere. Inspecting the teachers desk, you notice a key labeled: "potion storage" ontop of it.

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description: You are in a short hallway with plush chairs identical to the ones in the sitting area.

rooms.name: Chapel
rooms.description: You are in a chapel with high ceilings and rows of chairs. Sitting down in one, you look around more. You notice stained glass windows, interesting designs on the walls and what looks like a super cool bakery to the south. Thinking more about the bakery, you begin to notice the sweet smell of baking pastries and fall asleep by mistake... Oops!

rooms.name: Staircase
rooms.description: You are at the bottom of a tall a staircase.

rooms.name: Bake House
rooms.description: You are surrounded by ovens and more importantly pastries. Unfortunately, the pastries are not for you and are probably poisoned. Taking a bite of one anyway, you realize it is inedible and are very sad. So the real question is: what produced the sweet scent you enjoyed in the chapel?

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description: You are in a short hallway with plush chairs identical to the ones in the sitting area.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: You are in a large kitchen, surrounded by pots and pans.

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description: You are in a long hallway.

rooms.name: Outside
rooms.description: You step outside. The grey sky, dull field and lack of anything fun is catching your eyes. You are having such a great time looking at nothing, watching the grass grow and the paint on the side of the building dry. You are relaxed, recharged, refreshed. You have decided that going outside made this day the best day of your life. Wait... why am I here again? To your supprise, going outside got old fast. You are now bored beyond belief, and want to go inside so badly, but it's almost as if a magical force is holding you here.

rooms.name: Music Room
rooms.description: You are in an empty music room. Instruments surround you.

rooms.name: Closet
rooms.description: You are in a small storage room. To your left you see a flute.

rooms.name: Stairs
rooms.description: You are in the stairway. The walls are filled with portraits from the olden days. There's a stair landing up ahead.

rooms.name: Stair Landing
rooms.description: You are standing in the stair landing. You see dark mysterious hallways to your east and west.

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description: The hallway is awfully long. The light shines through the north facing windows and shines directly onto the door to the Charms class. The door is creeked open.

rooms.name: Charms Classroom
rooms.description: Long desks fill the room. You see white feathers laying on the desks. Professor Lupin teaches you how to cast a boggart-bainshing spell.

rooms.name: Astronomy Classroom
rooms.description: The room is dimly lit. You see a dusty globe that looks untouched.

rooms.name: Astronomy Classroom
rooms.description: You see a model of the solar system in front of you. The center of the sun is glowing.

rooms.name: Astronomy Classroom
rooms.description: Nothing much to see here. Just a few bookshelves filled with astronomy books.

rooms.name: Astronomy Class
rooms.description: There's a golden telescope in front of you. It points towards the direction of the Gryffindor Dormitory.

rooms.name: Dark Matter Class
rooms.description: The room is empty. But a book of death spells catches your eye.

rooms.name: Funny Death Room
rooms.description: [description] You died.

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description: [add description] Walking in a hallway.

rooms.name: Your Room
rooms.description: [description] You spot a black cloak sitting in an opened gift box.

rooms.name: Tunnel
rooms.description: You are in a very dark tunnel with a few lights that flicker.

rooms.name: Room of Wisdom
rooms.description: [description, gives player clues].

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description: [description] At the end of the hallway you see a glass door leading to the outside.

rooms.name: Balcony
rooms.description: Ooh its chilly outside. You better go back inside before the wind picks up.
